member.name: IMessageDispatcher.PumpMessages
member.summary: Performs custom dispatching when window messages are available to be dispatched on an ASTA thread.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMessageDispatcher
member.summary: Callback interface implemented by components that need to perform special processing of window messages on an ASTA thread.
